content.text:
# Albert of the United Kingdom (disambiguation)

Albert of the United Kingdom most commonly refers to Prince Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha (1819–1861), the husband of Queen Victoria.
Albert of the United Kingdom may also refer to:
*Edward VII (1841–1910), born Albert Edward, Prince of Wales.
*Prince Albert Victor, Duke of Clarence and Avondale (1864–1962), eldest son of Albert Edward, Prince of Wales and Alexandra of Denmark.
*George VI (1895–1952), known as Prince Albert prior to his accession.
